description:
At Osteen Law Group, in Savannah, Georgia, we aggressively advocate on behalf of individuals who struggle to move forward with their lives following a personal injury. Our law firm treats every case as if it is our only case, and we prepare each one to maximize recovery. Though every situation is unique and requires a unique approach, each client benefits from a thorough, free initial consultation, ongoing communication through in-person and virtual appointments, and our extensive network of resources, which includes medical professionals, economists, accident reconstruction specialists and engineers.

Our law firm has a long-standing reputation amongst defense attorneys and insurance adjusters alike for pursuing nothing less than the maximum amount of compensation for our clients. We use our substantial resources and considerable expertise to deliver the best possible results for injured parties, regardless of the cause of their injuries. Types of cases our law firm can competently handle include the following:

• Car accidents
• Truck accidents
• Product liability
• Premises liability
• Animal bites
• Brain injuries
• Birth injuries
• Bad faith insurance
• Construction accidents
• Admiralty and maritime matters
• Medical malpractice
• Alternative dispute resolution
• Assault and battery
• Consumer protection
• Defamation and privacy
• Nursing home abuse
• Railroad worker injury-FELA
• Toxic mold
• Wrongful death
• Class action lawsuits
• Auto dealer fraud
• Landlord-tenant disputes

In the past 20 plus years, Osteen Law Group is proud to say we have helped over 1,000 clients recover over $50 million in damages. We attribute our success to our people-first attitude, which is evident in everything from our acceptance of credit cards to our ethical approach to our unwavering passion for justice.
